detail_desc: Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Top with long raglan sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Fitted body in stretch ribbed viscose jersey with seams under the bust and a low cut front and back with silicone tape on the inside. Short sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Short-sleeved top in fast-drying, functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, a ventilating section at the back and raw-edges at the cuffs and hem. Seamless.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable, lined hood with elastication around the edge. Zip with a chin guard at the front, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Fleece lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, decorative ring at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

prod_name: D1 PE AUTUMN WOOL RD NECK
detail_desc: Top in soft, airy, slub-knit wool jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in patterned slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short coat in marled bouclé yarn with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, concealed zip and press-studs down the front and flap welt pockets. Lined.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Stylish top in sturdy pima cotton jersey. Relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline and vertical seams front and back. Rounded shoulders and long, straight-cut dolman sleeves.
Bikini top with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
Suede shoulder bag with a metal-chain strap, metal decoration, magnetic fastener and one zipped inner pocket. Cotton lining. Size 4.5x15x21 cm.
Long-sleeved body in soft velour. Deep V-neck with a knot detail at the front for a draping effect, a seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press studs.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Canvas clutch bag with a flap, metal fastener and magnetic catch, a thin metal chain shoulder strap and small compartment inside. Size 26x19 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button.
Top in airy, textured jersey with a deep V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, reflective strips on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Large metal earrings with faceted plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length approx. 10 cm.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Jumper in a soft knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Metal and plastic earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from approx. 2.5 cm to 4 cm.
Soft shoes in organic cotton with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined at the top.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Thick socks in a fine-knit wool blend with foldover tops.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Wide shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a wide elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Cap in printed twill with an appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Padded jacket in windproof and water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a high collar and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Partly lined.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves. Unlined.

Short biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections at the shoulders, cuffs and back of the hem. Small stand-up collar, diagonal zip down the front and side pockets. Pile lining with satin-lined sleeves.

Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket and chest pockets with small, decorative metal studs at the top. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight hem with slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft, printed viscose jersey with short sleeves and ties at one side of the hem.
Cropped, boxy-style sports top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Oversized slipover in a soft knit with a V-neck and cable-knit sections at the front. Ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a cut-out pattern, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Skinny-fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist and narrow hems. Zip fly with a button, and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
5-pocket jeans in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Wide, slightly boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim made from a soft, stretch Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist and slim, straight legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Lace body with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, moulded cups and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, flared dress in an airy, textured cotton weave. Elasticated, square neckline, gathered tiers and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a soft weave with covered elastication at the waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a flap chest pocket with a press-stud. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, and front and back pockets.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Double-layered hat in a rib-knit wool blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a collar and lower section in a cotton weave, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, small embroidery detail at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
